body:
Comment 4 by **szopa@google.com**: 
Yes, I am talking about paren-mode. It says that the parentheses don't match in the
places that I marked.

Just checked on a different emacs: in 24.2 (OS X) it indeed works fine, it's broken in 
23.3.1 (Linux, Ubuntu) (starting at the particular release I mentioned earlier). I ran
it with -q and then loaded go-mode-load.el, so I don't think it's some other elisp code
interacting.
